newsitem.title: USA: Ticketmaster in venture with Golden Bear.
newsitem.headline: Ticketmaster in venture with Golden Bear.

text.p: Ticketmaster Group Inc said Wednesday it has an agreement with Golden Bear Golf Inc to form a joint venture that will offer golfers advance ticketing for specific tee times.

The new company, called Ticketmaster Golf, will be based in Orlando, Fla., and will use its own computerized ticketing system to make it easy to search for available tee times at leading, daily fee golf courses, it said.
The company is expected to be operational this summer, it added.
It said that with Ticketmaster Golf's computerized system, golfers will be able to purchase tee times by telephone, through the Internet and through other outlets as much as a year in advance.
Golden Bear is a golf products and services company based in Orlando whose chairman and largest stockholder is Jack Nicklaus, a spokesman for the company said.
Ticketmaster provides computerized ticketing service that operates in the U.S., Canada, Mexico, Europe and Australia for sports events, concerts, family entertainment, performing arts and movies.
